snippet.title: Fallen Tear: The Ascension Teaser Video
snippet.description:
Fallen Tear : The Ascension is in early development. More coming soon!

Fallen Tear: The Ascension is a hand-crafted 2D open-world Metroidvania set in the world of Raoah. In this Dark Fantasy, you take the role of a mysterious child named Hira, who seeks the 22 Fated Bonds to learn the truth of his origins and save a loved one.

To get the latest news and update, visit:
https://www.fallentearascension.com/

#indiegame #indiegamedev #2Dmetroidvania #metroidvania #fallenteargame
